```{r}
# Load required packages
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(spatstat)

# Import the BC Covariates dataset
load("BC_Covariates.Rda")

library(readxl)

# Read the Excel file
df <- read_excel("Moose_data.xlsx")

# Load the required library
library(dplyr)

# Create a new data frame with latitude, longitude, and stateProvince columns
coordinates_df <- data.frame(
  latitude = latitude_column,
  longitude = longitude_column,
  stateProvince = rep(state_province, length.out = nrow(df))
)

# Print the filtered data frame for verification
head(coordinates_df)
```


```{r}
# Extracting each element from DATA
```

```{r}
str(DATA)
```

```{r}
# Remove missing values from latitude and longitude columns
coordinates_df <- coordinates_df[complete.cases(coordinates_df), ]

# Create an owin object to define the spatial domain
# Adjust the window bounds as needed based on your data
win <- owin(range(coordinates_df$latitude), range(coordinates_df$longitude))

# Convert the data to a ppp object
loc_ppp <- ppp(coordinates_df$latitude, coordinates_df$longitude, window = win)

# Plot the ppp object
plot(loc_ppp, main = "Spatial Distribution of Moose")
```
